title: Backyard Envy
overview: James DeSantis, Garrett Magee and Melissa Brasier make-up the exclusive exterior design and high-end landscaping firm, the Manscapers, and viewers will go along for the ride as this set of best friends and business partners reimagine outdoor spaces and help their clients turn the ordinary into the extraordinary. In every episode James, Garrett and Melissa will hatch a plan to do a full outdoor renovation design from rooftops to backyards in the suburbs and beyond. These "Two Wills and a Grace" are put to the test as they juggle tight deadlines, multiple clients and each other as they transform barren outdoor spaces into lush, jaw-dropping escapes.
